The Awesome Inc U Academy is a great way to prepare your kids for the future. It is a program that goes through the fall and will teach your kids skills that aren't taught in high schools. The best way to learn and excel at any skill is to surround yourself with other like-minded, motivated people.

The standard rate for the Awesome Inc U Academy is $533/month, however we're offering a sale of $429/month for a limited time.
